question:
Fill in the Blank:

He had to ________ his crime in court.
solution:
confess to

‘Confess to’ is used when admitting guilt.

Hindi Meaning: कुछ स्वीकार करना

Complete Sentence:

He had to confess to his crime.

उसे अदालत में अपना अपराध कबूल करना पड़ा।

Extra Example:

He confessed to the crime.

उसने अपराध कबूल किया।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

She always ________ her best friend in tough times.
solution:
confide in

‘Confide in’ means to trust someone with personal matters.

Hindi Meaning: किसी ऐसे व्यक्ति के साथ रहस्य साझा करना जिस पर आप भरोसा करते हों

Complete Sentence:

She always confides in her best friend.

वह मुश्किल समय में हमेशा अपनी सबसे अच्छी दोस्त पर भरोसा करती है।

Extra Example:

She confided in her best friend.

उसने अपनी सबसे अच्छी दोस्त से राज़ साझा किया।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

He is ________ winning the game.
solution:
confident of

‘Confident of’ means sure or positive about something.

Hindi Meaning: अपनी क्षमता के बारे में निश्चित

Complete Sentence:

He is confident of winning the game.

वह खेल जीतने को लेकर आश्वस्त है।

Extra Example:

She is confident of her success.

वह अपनी सफलता को लेकर आश्वस्त है।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

There was a major ________ the two nations.
solution:
conflict between

'Conflict between' is used for two parties.

Hindi Meaning: झड़प या लड़ाई

Complete Sentence:

There was a major conflict between the two nations.

दोनों देशों के बीच बड़ा संघर्ष था।

Extra Example:

There is a conflict between two groups.

दो समूहों के बीच संघर्ष है।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

The building does not ________ safety standards.
solution:
conform to

‘Conform to’ means to follow rules or standards.

Hindi Meaning: नियमों या मानकों का पालन करना

Complete Sentence:

The building does not conform to safety standards.

यह इमारत सुरक्षा मानकों के अनुरूप नहीं है।

Extra Example:

Products must conform to safety standards.

उत्पादों को सुरक्षा मानकों का पालन करना चाहिए।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

I’m ________ the instructions.
solution:
confused about

‘Confused about’ indicates lack of understanding.

Hindi Meaning: समझ नहीं

Complete Sentence:

I’m confused about the instructions.

मुझे निर्देशों को लेकर उलझन है।

Extra Example:

I am confused about the instructions.

मैं निर्देशों को लेकर भ्रमित हूँ।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

I must ________ you on your promotion.
solution:
congratulate on

‘Congratulate on’ is used to express good wishes.

Hindi Meaning: किसी की उपलब्धि के लिए उसकी प्रशंसा करना

Complete Sentence:

I must congratulate on your promotion.

मुझे आपकी पदोन्नति पर बधाई देनी है।

Extra Example:

I congratulated him on his promotion.

मैंने उसे पदोन्नति पर बधाई दी।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

He is ________ a political group.
solution:
connected to

'Connected to' indicates direct link or association.

Hindi Meaning: शारीरिक या भावनात्मक रूप से जुड़ा हुआ

Complete Sentence:

He is connected to a political group.

वह एक राजनीतिक समूह से जुड़ा हुआ है।

Extra Example:

The printer is connected to the computer.

प्रिंटर कंप्यूटर से जुड़ा हुआ है।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

The suspect is ________ a terrorist group.
solution:
connected with

‘Connected with’ means affiliated or associated.

Hindi Meaning: से जुड़ा हुआ

Complete Sentence:

The suspect is connected with a terrorist group.

संदिग्ध का एक आतंकी समूह से संबंध है।

Extra Example:

This book is connected with history.

यह किताब इतिहास से जुड़ी हुई है।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

The book shows the deep ________ mind and body.
solution:
connection between

'Connection between' is used for two ideas or things.

Hindi Meaning: लिंक या संबंध

Complete Sentence:

The book shows the deep connection between mind and body.

पुस्तक मन और शरीर के बीच गहरे संबंध को दर्शाती है।

Extra Example:

The connection between stress and illness is known.

तनाव और बीमारी के बीच संबंध ज्ञात है।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

They did not ________ the proposal.
solution:
consent to

‘Consent to’ means to give permission for something.

Hindi Meaning: अनुमति देना

Complete Sentence:

They did not consent to the proposal.

उन्होंने प्रस्ताव को स्वीकृति नहीं दी।

Extra Example:

They consented to the proposal.

उन्होंने प्रस्ताव को मंजूरी दी।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

The team ________ experienced players.
solution:
consist of

‘Consist of’ is used to list components or elements.

Hindi Meaning: किसी चीज़ से बना होना

Complete Sentence:

The team consists of experienced players.

टीम में अनुभवी खिलाड़ियों का समावेश है।

Extra Example:

The team consists of five members.

टीम में पाँच सदस्य हैं।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

She is ________ what she has achieved.
solution:
content with

‘Content with’ means satisfied or pleased.

Hindi Meaning: संतुष्ट

Complete Sentence:

She is content with her achievements.

वह अपनी उपलब्धियों से संतुष्ट है।

Extra Example:

He is content with his job.

वह अपनी नौकरी से संतुष्ट है।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

He wants to ________ the success of the project.
solution:
contribute to

‘Contribute to’ means to help achieve or bring about something.

Hindi Meaning: कुछ हासिल करने में मदद करने के लिए देना

Complete Sentence:

He wants to contribute to the success of the project.

वह परियोजना की सफलता में योगदान देना चाहता है।

Extra Example:

She contributed to the project.

उसने प्रोजेक्ट में योगदान दिया।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

The team will ________ the relief effort.
solution:
contribute towards

‘Contribute towards’ means to assist in a cause or goal.

Hindi Meaning: एक सामान्य उद्देश्य के लिए देना

Complete Sentence:

The team will contribute towards the relief effort.

टीम राहत कार्य में योगदान देगी।

Extra Example:

He contributed towards the relief fund.

उसने राहत कोष में योगदान दिया।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

His ________ the charity was generous.
solution:
contribution to

‘Contribution to’ means donation or help towards something.

Hindi Meaning: सहायता या समर्थन प्रदान करना

Complete Sentence:

His contribution to the charity was generous.

उसका चैरिटी में योगदान उदार था।

Extra Example:

He made a contribution to the charity.

उसने चैरिटी में योगदान दिया।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

He lost all ________ his emotions.
solution:
control over

'Control over' something means authority.

Hindi Meaning: प्रभावित करने या निर्देश देने की शक्ति

Complete Sentence:

He lost all control over his emotions.

उसने अपनी भावनाओं पर से नियंत्रण खो दिया।

Extra Example:

He has control over the project.

उसका परियोजना पर नियंत्रण है।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

He was ________ theft by the jury.
solution:
convict of

‘Convict of’ is used when someone is found guilty.

Hindi Meaning: दोषी पाना

Complete Sentence:

He was convicted of theft.

उसे चोरी का दोषी ठहराया गया।

Extra Example:

He was convicted of theft.

उसे चोरी का दोषी ठहराया गया।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

She had to ________ great difficulties.
solution:
cope with

‘Cope with’ means to manage a difficult situation.

Hindi Meaning: किसी कठिन परिस्थिति से प्रभावी ढंग से निपटने के लिए

Complete Sentence:

She had to cope with great difficulties.

उसे भारी कठिनाइयों का सामना करना पड़ा।

Extra Example:

She is coping with stress well.

वह तनाव को अच्छी तरह संभाल रही है।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

You can always ________ me for support.
solution:
count on

‘Count on’ means to rely or depend on someone.

Hindi Meaning: किसी पर निर्भर होना

Complete Sentence:

You can always count on me.

तुम हमेशा मुझ पर भरोसा कर सकते हो।

Extra Example:

You can count on me.

तुम मुझ पर भरोसा कर सकते हो।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

He is ________ cricket and talks about it all the time.
solution:
crazy about

‘Crazy about’ means extremely fond of something.

Hindi Meaning: बहुत उत्साही या भावुक

Complete Sentence:

He is crazy about cricket.

वह क्रिकेट को लेकर पागल है।

Extra Example:

She is crazy about K-pop.

वह के-पॉप को लेकर पागल है।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

She is ________ chocolates.
solution:
crazy for

‘Crazy for’ shows strong liking or craving.

Hindi Meaning: किसी चीज़ का बहुत शौकीन

Complete Sentence:

She is crazy for chocolates.

वह चॉकलेट्स के लिए पागल है।

Extra Example:

He is crazy for cricket.

वह क्रिकेट के लिए पागल है।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

The teacher was ________ her for cheating.
solution:
critical of

'Critical of' means expressing disapproval.

Hindi Meaning: कठोर निर्णय देना

Complete Sentence:

The teacher was critical of her for cheating.

अध्यापक ने नकल करने पर उस पर आलोचना की।

Extra Example:

She is critical of modern fashion trends.

वह आधुनिक फैशन प्रवृत्तियों की आलोचक है।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

The train was ________ passengers.
solution:
crowded with

'Crowded with' means full of.

Hindi Meaning: लोगों या चीजों से भरा हुआ

Complete Sentence:

The train was crowded with passengers.

ट्रेन यात्रियों से भरी हुई थी।

Extra Example:

The hall was crowded with students.

हॉल छात्रों से भरा हुआ था।

question:
Fill in the Blank:

Scientists are working on a ________ cancer.
solution:
cure for

‘Cure for’ is used to describe a remedy.

Hindi Meaning: एक बीमारी का समाधान

Complete Sentence:

Scientists are working on a cure for cancer.

वैज्ञानिक कैंसर का इलाज खोज रहे हैं।

Extra Example:

They found a cure for the illness.

उन्होंने बीमारी का इलाज ढूंढ लिया।
